desc: Blomdahl works with skin specialists to create a safe line of elegant medical ear & nose piercing & hypoallergenic fine jewellery made from the finest materials.

layout.text:
Medical Grade Piercing
Skin Friendly Jewellery

At Blomdahl we take an internationally accredited and medical approach in developing a safe piercing system and creating jewellery made of medical quality. This ensures you and your loved ones can wear beautiful jewellery without the worry of infections or allergies.
